description: This international travel course examines economic change in Britain from the Industrial Revolution to the current European Union membership. The course focuses on the process of change and how economic factors interact with values and culture. Prerequisite: one of Economics 110-122, or consent of instructor. Offered alternate Interims.
name: Britain in Transition
prerequisites: Prerequisite: one of Economics 110-122, or consent of instructor. Offered alternate Interims.
title: Britain in Transition -- Economic Leader to European Union
